channel.title: Local Host
channel.description:
I have the following version of JDK: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23
I changed the ip in client.java to 0.0.0.0 in order to be able to local host, however it seems that it doesn't like my java even though I've changed it in the launcher, and all necessary files.
If anyone knows of a specific tut to describe how to do this or could give me a little insight to a guide it'd be much appreciated :)

item.title: Local Host
item.dc:creator: @xhellgiverx xhellgiverx
item.description:
@xhellgiverx wrote:

I have the following version of JDK:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23

I changed the ip in client.java to 0.0.0.0 in order to be able to local host, however it seems that it doesn’t like my java even though I’ve changed it in the launcher, and all necessary files.

If anyone knows of a specific tut to describe how to do this or could give me a little insight to a guide it’d be much appreciated
